items.title: Polls open in US elections - here are five things to watch
items.description: Though President Donald Trump is not on the ballot, his agenda looms large over the races in New York City, New Jersey, and Virginia.

items.title: More than 50 missed opportunities to stop paedophile head, report finds
items.description: Neil Foden, 68, was jailed for 17 years after being convicted of 19 charges involving four girls.

items.title: Alexander-Arnold mural defaced before Anfield return
items.description: A mural of Trent Alexander-Arnold has been vandalised as the Real Madrid right-back prepares to face former club Liverpool on Tuesday.

items.title: British boy who sued parents must stay at Ghana boarding school, judge rules
items.description: The boy, 14 and from London, took his parents to court after they sent him to school in Africa.

items.title: Reeves refuses to rule out tax rises in Budget as she says she will make 'necessary choices'
items.description: The chancellor says she will make 'necessary choices' in an unusual pre-Budget speech.
